### Title (Titre)
#### Stage 2 – Installation of Fleet EV Chargers – Prince Edward Island National Park
#### Phase 2 - Installation de chargeurs de véhicules électriques – Parc National de l’Île-du-Prince-Édouard

### Reference Information
#### *Title:* 5P468-24-0119/B
#### *Notice Type:* Request for Proposal
#### *Purchase Category:* CNST
#### *Trade Agreements:* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
#### *Regions of Opportunity:* Canada
#### *Regions of Delivery:* Canada, Prince Edward Island

### Tender Information
#### *Tender Status:* Open
#### *Tender Closing Date:* November 28, 2024, at 13:00 EST
#### *Expected Contract Start Date:* Currently, no expected start date is available.
#### *Expected Contract End Date:* Currently, no expected end date is available.

### Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
Parks Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a financial proposal for the installation of 12 electrical vehicle (EV) chargers in the administration building parking area of Dalvay, Prince Edward Island. To accommodate a growing fleet of Parks Canada EVs, the selected contractor will be required to prepare for and complete the installation.

### Requirements
- Pre-installation preparation for 12 EV chargers
- Installation of the EV chargers
- Compliance with relevant safety and environmental regulations

### Evaluation Criteria
The contractor's proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
- Technical proposal
- Financial proposal

### Contact Information
If you are interested in submitting a proposal, please contact:
Annik Piché
Annik.piche@pc.gc.ca
(581) 398-3489
